senses: [{"definition":"A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.","example":null},{"definition":"Any of various tree-borne fruits or vegetables especially considered as resembling an apple; also (with qualifying words) used to form the names of other specific fruits such as custard apple, rose apple, thorn apple etc.","example":null},{"definition":"The fruit of the Tree of Knowledge, eaten by Adam and Eve according to post-Biblical Christian tradition; the forbidden fruit.","example":null},{"definition":"A tree of the genus Malus, especially one cultivated for its edible fruit; the apple tree.","example":null},{"definition":"The wood of the apple tree.","example":null},{"definition":"(in the plural) Short for apples and pears, slang for stairs.","example":null},{"definition":"The ball in baseball.","example":null},{"definition":"When smiling, the round, fleshy part of the cheeks between the eyes and the corners of the mouth.","example":null},{"definition":"A Native American or red-skinned person who acts and\/or thinks like a white (Caucasian) person.","example":null},{"definition":"(ice hockey slang) An assist.","example":null},{"definition":"To become apple-like.","example":null},{"definition":"To form buds.","example":null}]
